meta.description: Determine the optimal number of circular and rectangular tables to maximize the number of catered guests at a science fair.

sets.name: TABLE_TYPES
sets.description: Types of tables available for the science fair.

params.name: participants_per_table
params.description: Number of participants that can fit around each type of table.

params.name: poster_boards_per_table
params.description: Number of poster boards that can fit around each type of table.

params.name: guests_per_table
params.description: Number of guests that can be catered by each type of table.

params.name: space_per_table
params.description: Space taken by each type of table.

params.name: min_participants
params.description: Minimum number of participants that must be accommodated.

params.name: min_poster_boards
params.description: Minimum number of poster boards that must be accommodated.

vars.name: num_tables
vars.description: Number of each type of table to set up.

objective.name: max_catered_guests
objective.description: Maximize the number of guests that can be catered.

constraints.name: participant_requirement
constraints.description: Ensure at least 500 participants can be accommodated.

constraints.name: poster_board_requirement
constraints.description: Ensure at least 300 poster boards can be accommodated.

constraints.name: space_constraint
constraints.description: Ensure the total space used does not exceed 1900 units.
